p: Viral detection was performed on 414 specimens. In total, 329 human specimens were collected, including 95 stool samples, 213 anal swabs, 13 throat swabs and 8 vomit samples. A total of 85 environmental specimens were obtained from 47 food samples, 26 contaminated water samples and 12 surface swabs. All 414 specimens were tested for NoV, RoV, SaV, Ast, and ADV.
